description: This hearty porcupine meatballs recipe is cooked in one dish and nutritionally approved. It's the ultimate easy meatball recipe that's sure to be a family favourite.
name: Healthier Baked Porcupine Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800 g cans no-added-salt diced Italian tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine passata, tomatoes, vinegar and remaining parsley in a medium bowl. Season with pepper. Pour passata mixture over meatballs. Cover dish with foil and bake for 30 minutes or until meatballs are cooked through. Uncover and bake for a further 30 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly. Sprinkle with extra parsley and serve with salad leaves.

Sprinkle with extra parsley and serve with salad leaves.
